description: Try our easy to follow Poached Salmon & Asparagus recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Poached Salmon & Asparagus Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400 g Woolworths Cook baby herb & butter potatoes,

recipeInstructions.text: Remove asparagus and salmon from pan with a slotted spoon. Drain on paper towel. Divide between serving plates. Spoon over hollandaise sauce and serve with potatoes and lemon.
